item.title: Packing multiple binaries in a Golang package
item.description: Recently, while writing a small Golang program for setting reminders I came across a small confusion that I guess most newcomers to Golang will have - how to organise a package in a way that will enable it to cleanly contain two or more binaries. This post is not aimed at experienced Golang programmers, it's mostly aimed at beginners to understand how to compose more complex packages, beyond making the usual “one package one binary” ones.
